verses.verse: The proverbs<WH4912> of Solomon<WH8010>. A wise<WH2450> son<WH1121> maketh a glad<WH8055> father<WH1>; But a foolish<WH3684> son<WH1121> is the heaviness<WH8424> of his mother<WH517>.
Treasures <WH214> of wickedness<WH7562> profit<WH3276> nothing<WH6666>; But righteousness delivereth<WH5337> from death<WH4194>.
Jehovah <WH3068> will not suffer<WH7456> the soul<WH5315> of the righteous<WH6662> to famish<WH7456>; But he thrusteth away<WH1920> the desire<WH1942> of the wicked<WH7563>.
He becometh poor<WH7326> that worketh<WH6213> with a slack<WH7423> hand<WH3709>; But the hand<WH3027> of the diligent<WH2742> maketh rich<WH6238>.
He that gathereth<WH103> in summer<WH7019> is a wise<WH7919> son<WH1121>; But he that sleepeth<WH7290> in harvest<WH7105> is a son<WH1121> that causeth shame<WH954>.
Blessings <WH1293> are upon the head<WH7218> of the righteous<WH6662>; But violence<WH2555> covereth<WH3680> the mouth<WH6310> of the wicked<WH7563>.
The memory<WH2143> of the righteous<WH6662> is blessed<WH1293>; But the name<WH8034> of the wicked<WH7563> shall rot<WH7537>.
The wise<WH2450> in heart<WH3820> will receive<WH3947> commandments<WH4687>; But a prating<WH8193> fool<WH191> shall fall<WH3832>.
He that walketh<WH3212> uprightly<WH8537> walketh<WH1980> surely<WH983>; But he that perverteth<WH6140> his ways<WH1870> shall be known<WH3045>.
He that winketh<WH7169> with the eye<WH5869> causeth<WH5414> sorrow<WH6094>; But a prating<WH8193> fool<WH191> shall fall<WH3832>.
The mouth<WH6310> of the righteous<WH6662> is a fountain<WH4726> of life<WH2416>; But violence<WH2555> covereth<WH3680> the mouth<WH6310> of the wicked<WH7563>.
Hatred <WH8135> stirreth up<WH5782> strifes<WH4090>; But love<WH160> covereth<WH3680> all transgressions<WH6588>.
In the lips<WH8193> of him that hath discernment<WH995> wisdom<WH2451> is found<WH4672>; But a rod<WH7626> is for the back<WH1460> of him that is void<WH2638> of understanding<WH3820>.
Wise <WH2450> men lay up<WH6845> knowledge<WH1847>; But the mouth<WH6310> of the foolish<WH191> is a present<WH7138> destruction<WH4288>.
The rich man<WH6223>'s wealth<WH1952> is his strong<WH5797> city<WH7151>: The destruction<WH4288> of the poor<WH1800> is their poverty<WH7389>.
The labor<WH6468> of the righteous<WH6662> tendeth to life<WH2416>; The increase<WH8393> of the wicked<WH7563>, to sin<WH2403>.
He is in the way<WH734> of life<WH2416> that heedeth<WH8104> correction<WH4148>; But he that forsaketh<WH5800> reproof<WH8433> erreth<WH8582>.
He that hideth<WH3680> hatred<WH8135> is of lying<WH8267> lips<WH8193>; And he that uttereth<WH3318> a slander<WH1681> is a fool<WH3684>.
In the multitude<WH7230> of words<WH1697> there wanteth<WH2308> not transgression<WH6588>; But he that refraineth<WH2820> his lips<WH8193> doeth wisely<WH7919>.
The tongue<WH3956> of the righteous<WH6662> is as choice<WH977> silver<WH3701>: The heart<WH3820> of the wicked<WH7563> is little worth<WH4592>.
The lips<WH8193> of the righteous<WH6662> feed<WH7462> many<WH7227>; But the foolish<WH191> die<WH4191> for lack<WH2638> of understanding<WH3820>.
The blessing<WH1293> of Jehovah<WH3068>, it maketh rich<WH6238>; And he addeth<WH3254> no sorrow therewith<WH6089>.
It is as sport<WH7814> to a fool<WH3684> to do<WH6213> wickedness<WH2154>; And so is wisdom<WH2451> to a man<WH376> of understanding<WH8394>.
The fear<WH4034> of the wicked<WH7563>, it shall come<WH935> upon him<WH8378>; And the desire of the righteous<WH6662> shall be granted<WH5414>.
When the whirlwind<WH5492> passeth<WH5674>, the wicked<WH7563> is no more<WH6662>; But the righteous is an everlasting<WH5769> foundation<WH3247>.
As vinegar<WH2558> to the teeth<WH8127>, and as smoke<WH6227> to the eyes<WH5869>, So is the sluggard<WH6102> to them that send him<WH7971>.
The fear<WH3374> of Jehovah<WH3068> prolongeth<WH3254> days<WH3117>; But the years<WH8141> of the wicked<WH7563> shall be shortened<WH7114>.
The hope<WH8431> of the righteous<WH6662> shall be gladness<WH8057>; But the expectation<WH8615> of the wicked<WH7563> shall perish<WH6>.
The way<WH1870> of Jehovah<WH3068> is a stronghold<WH4581> to the upright<WH8537>; But it is a destruction<WH4288> to the workers<WH6466> of iniquity<WH205>.
The righteous<WH6662> shall never<WH5769> be removed<WH4131>; But the wicked<WH7563> shall not dwell<WH7931> in the land<WH776>.
The mouth<WH6310> of the righteous<WH6662> bringeth forth<WH5107> wisdom<WH2451>; But the perverse<WH8419> tongue<WH3956> shall be cut off<WH3772>.
The lips<WH8193> of the righteous<WH6662> know<WH3045> what is acceptable<WH7522>; But the mouth<WH6310> of the wicked<WH7563> speaketh perverseness<WH8419>.
